name: tfstck
description:
CW: IMPLIED ANIMAL DEATH, AND MURDER. Nothing explicit is shown.

Hi! This was my first time actually completing a game. I used RPGMaker MV.

This project was made for me and someone's 1-v-1 48 hour Game Jam. Needless to say I'm quite happy with the end result!

My friend, who wasn't participating, came up with the theme for our Game Jam. The theme was: "The cats in the whole neighborhood disappeared , it's your job to find out why or/and to bring them back."

We were free to interpret the theme however we want, so long as the essence (the underlined words) of the theme is still there.

I went with a more Visual Novel-esque approach to the game since it was what I was used to. 

I am planning to improve this short game in the future with custom sprites, etc.
